name: Shackled (itch) (EpicCrownKing)
description:
Submitted for GMTK 2021

Shackled is a puzzle-platformer where you must escape from a deep and dark abandoned dungeon that you accidentally stumbled into. Your only tool of escape is a shackle you find laying on the ground. Use the shackle to your advantage to make your way out of the dungeon to safety.

Credits

Code and art(excluding character design) by EpicCrownKing

Audio and music by A44

Character design by Tobias

Made with Unity
